name: Big Cylinder

desc.0: This super-powerful support W-Engine, into which Ben installed extra heavy oil cylinders to keep it growling along, can even provide sufficient power for heavy-duty machinery. Despite its weight being so massive that ordinary people cannot lift it, for Ben, it's the perfect counterweight ball for his concrete pillar.
desc.2: <ct color=#959595>"Don't worry. I've calculated the counterweight position and impact resistance factor down to four decimal places. It won't impact weapon performance." â€” Ben, before taking out his notebook to check over the calculations yet again</ct>

desc2: Equip to increase Defense Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A powerful protection-type W-Engine, characterized by thick oil cylinders that ceaselessly roar inside it. It can provide sufficient power for heavy machinery.
phaseDescs: Reduces DMG taken by <ct color=#2BAD00>7.5%</ct>. After being attacked, the next attack to hit an enemy will trigger a critical hit and deal <ct color=#2BAD00>600%</ct> of the equipper's DEF as additional DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 7.5s.

Reduces DMG taken by <ct color=#2BAD00>8.5%</ct>. After being attacked, the next attack to hit an enemy will trigger a critical hit and deal <ct color=#2BAD00>690%</ct> of the equipper's DEF as additional DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 7.5s.

Reduces DMG taken by <ct color=#2BAD00>9.5%</ct>. After being attacked, the next attack to hit an enemy will trigger a critical hit and deal <ct color=#2BAD00>780%</ct> of the equipper's DEF as additional DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 7.5s.

Reduces DMG taken by <ct color=#2BAD00>10.5%</ct>. After being attacked, the next attack to hit an enemy will trigger a critical hit and deal <ct color=#2BAD00>870%</ct> of the equipper's DEF as additional DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 7.5s.

Reduces DMG taken by <ct color=#2BAD00>12%</ct>. After being attacked, the next attack to hit an enemy will trigger a critical hit and deal <ct color=#2BAD00>960%</ct> of the equipper's DEF as additional DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 7.5s.
